about_the_game:
Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS.

Move and rotate the pieces along the 3 axes (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.

Features


4 game modes:

  • Classic: Play the game with the classic puzzle pieces of the 2D puzzle game Tetris.
  • Relaxing: Same as Classic mode but you will not level up, the fall speed will not change.
  • Challenging: Classic with some new pieces that can trick your brain.
  • Insane: Challenging mode plus new pieces that increase the difficulty to a new level.

Different Volumes

From the smallest 4x4x10 to the biggest 8x8x20, you can customize your level of challenge. each has its own leaderboard.

Gamepad Support

Supports PS4/PS5 and Xbox controllers. with more to come.

Widescreen Support

16:9 and 32:9 Aspect ratios supported in both Windowed and Full-Screen

Online Leaderboards

While Online, you can challenge yourself against other players worldwide with the online leaderboards

Offline support

While offline, you will have access to local leaderboards where you can type any name.

Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS.

Move and rotate the pieces along the 3 axes (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.

Features


4 game modes:

  • Classic: Play the game with the classic puzzle pieces of the 2D puzzle game Tetris.
  • Relaxing: Same as Classic mode but you will not level up, the fall speed will not change.
  • Challenging: Classic with some new pieces that can trick your brain.
  • Insane: Challenging mode plus new pieces that increase the difficulty to a new level.

Different Volumes

From the smallest 4x4x10 to the biggest 8x8x20, you can customize your level of challenge. each has its own leaderboard.

Gamepad Support

Supports PS4/PS5 and Xbox controllers. with more to come.

Widescreen Support

name: Depthris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Any processor with a clockspeed of 3.2 GHz or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Support for GL Shader Model 1.5 or better.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some AV may freeze the game, Add exception.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Any processor with clockspeed of 4.0 Ghz or more
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics card wih 4GB of VRam and GL Shader Model 1.5 or better.
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some AV may freeze the game, Add exception.

short_description: Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS. Move and rotate the pieces almost anywhere (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.
